description.label: Description
description.value:
To learn this Talent you must know one of:

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.O987u5M0SL46gm3v]{Fighting Style (Steelstorm)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.Da4zReU57OnesKGd]{Fighting Style (Ironshield)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.CUWdlx3IhkmTPL57]{Fighting Style (Evadecraft)}

If you do, you can buy a respective Fighting Master Talent with the matching Style:

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.F5UwuMe5XHl44Jrt]{Fighting Master (Steelstorm)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.uL8T7Gy9rRq74HIN]{Fighting Master (Ironshield)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.MCQGW6z3fWNdR5hO]{Fighting Master (Evadecraft)}
